name: column:click
description: Fires event when click on a column.

returns.description: A reference to the custom ZingGrid internal event.
returns.name: ZGEvent

returns.description: A reference to the DOM element.
returns.name: ZGTarget

name: column:filter
description: Fires the event when a column is filtered.

returns.description: The index that the filter is applied to e.g. "firstName".
returns.name: ZGData.filterIndex

dependency: The `filter` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

name: column:mouseout
description: Fires event when mouseout on a column.

returns.description: A reference to the custom ZingGrid internal event.
returns.name: ZGEvent

returns.description: A reference to the DOM element.
returns.name: ZGTarget

name: column:mouseover
description: Fires event when mouseover on a column.

returns.description: A reference to the custom ZingGrid internal event.
returns.name: ZGEvent

returns.description: A reference to the DOM element.
returns.name: ZGTarget
